Sent.description: The total number of emails sent.

Bounced.description: The total number of emails that bounced.

SMTPApiErrors.description: The total number of emails that encountered SMTP API errors.

BounceRate.description: The percentage of emails that bounced compared to the total sent.

SpamComplaints.description: The total number of emails marked as spam by recipients.

SpamComplaintsRate.description: The percentage of emails marked as spam compared to the total sent.

Tracked.description: The total number of emails with tracking enabled.

Opens.description: The total number of emails that were opened by recipients.

UniqueOpens.description: The total number of unique email opens.

TotalClicks.description: The total number of clicks on links within emails.

UniqueLinksClicked.description: The total number of unique links clicked by recipients.

WithClientRecorded.description: The total number of emails with client information recorded.

WithPlatformRecorded.description: The total number of emails with platform information recorded.

WithReadTimeRecorded.description: The total number of emails with read time information recorded.

WithLinkTracking.description: The total number of emails with link tracking enabled.

WithOpenTracking.description: The total number of emails with open tracking enabled.

TotalTrackedLinksSent.description: The total number of emails with tracked links sent.
